name: Giorgi Katamadze
title: President of Georgia
bio: A seasoned statesman with over 25 years of experience in public service and governance. President Katamadze is committed to democratic values, economic development, and regional stability.

name: Sandro Mikeladze
title: Premier Minister
bio: A dynamic political leader with a vision for economic modernization and social progress. Premier Minister Mikeladze is dedicated to implementing strategic reforms and strengthening Georgia's position on the international stage.

name: Niko Chitaishvili
title: Minister of Internal Affairs
bio: Former chief of police with a strong track record in law enforcement and public safety. Minister Chitaishvili focuses on modernizing security services and improving community relations.

name: Sandro Lamparadze
title: Minister of Education
bio: Renowned educator and reform advocate. Minister Lamparadze is driving educational innovation, curriculum modernization, and equal access to quality education across Georgia.

name: Rezi Chichua
title: Minister of Economics
bio: Economist and business strategist with extensive experience in market development. Minister Chichua leads initiatives to attract foreign investment and foster entrepreneurship.

name: Davit Shishmanidze
title: Building Minister
bio: Infrastructure strategist leading national building standards, resilient construction, and safe urban development across Georgia.

name: Irakli Lomadze
title: Minister of Agriculture
bio: Agriculture modernizer focused on resilient food systems, irrigation upgrades, and rural economic growth across Georgia.
